short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a shortcut to upmail.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a shortcut to upmail.

UpMail is a sales acceleration platform designed to support organisations to streamline their one-to-one sales communications and increase integration between sale and marketing to ultimately optimise their sales funnel. 

UpMail extension allow user to access to their UpMail account directly from Google Mail. 

Privacy policy: https://www.upmailsolutions.com/privacy-policy/
